title: ﻿क्या कन्हैया कुमार JNU में ११ बार फेल हुए ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Someone told me that @kanhaiyajnusu has failed for the 11th time in JNU. Does that make him a worthy applicant to the @INCIndia party? And why the hell are we taxpayers funding this loser’s education or the lack of it?
